product_name: DryGuy Octopus Boot Dryer with Glove Accessory
long_description: With 4 adjustable heating tubes and a glove-drying attachment, the DryGuy Drying Center helps you keep multiple pairs of boots, gloves and other accessories dry, fresh and odor free.
short_description: With 4 adjustable heating tubes and a glove-drying attachment, the DryGuy Drying Center helps you keep multiple pairs of boots, gloves and other accessories dry, fresh and odor free.
